availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Ayers Atchison, Jr. (Louisville, KY, attorney/Democrat (JR).)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Spoke in support of the Democratic Party in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1859. Attorney in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 155.
The Daily Courier (Louisville , KY), March 02, 1857, p. 1.
"Democratic Meeting at Osborn's Grocery," The Daily Courier (Louisville , KY), March 31, 1859, p. 1.
Find A Grave, "Samuel Ayers Atchison Jr. (1840-1880)," Memorial #100673466, accessed December 2, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100673466.
